caption.p: COVID-19 lung autopsy specimen. This figure is original and based on data from ( 46). It demonstrates COVID-19 pathology as seen in the lungs of an autopsied case (case 1, Barton et al.). (A) Diffuse alveolar damage. The arrow points to a hyaline membrane. (B) Interstitial lymphocytic inflammatory infiltrate. The arrow indicates lymphocytes within an alveolar septum. Hematoxylin-eosin stain, 200Ã—, both images.
